resources.string:
Welcome to CRAYFIS beta testing! 
Thank you for your help!


 CRAYFIS is an app 
which will use your smartphone
 to look for cosmic ray particles.

 For more info: http://crayfis.io/.




 What you need to do:
 Plug your phone in and
 put it camera down (face up) on a surface.

 When it starts it will take 30-60s to calibrate
 and then will start taking data!

No CRAYFIS ID? 
 No problem! Your data will not be uploaded to the server, but you can still run the app, and enter your ID later in the settings pane.
An internal error occurred and the activity you are currently viewing must close. Please try again.
